description: Gets an Amazon DataZone asset type.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the asset type exists.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the asset type.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the asset type was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the asset type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the asset type.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the asset type exists.

nested_items.name: formsOutput
nested_items.description: The metadata forms attached to the asset type.

nested_items.name: required
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a form entry is required.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the type of the form entry.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The type revision of the form entry.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the asset type.

nested_items.name: originDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the asset type was originally created.

nested_items.name: originProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone project in which the asset type was originally created.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone project that owns the asset type.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the asset type.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the asset type was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user that updated the asset type.
